alert.note: Alert for Adams; Highland; Pike; Ross; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 2:01AM EDT until April 01 at 2:45AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lewis County in northeastern Kentucky... Eastern Adams County in southwestern Ohio... Pike County in southwestern Ohio... Southeastern Highland County in southwestern Ohio... Northwestern Scioto County in southwestern Ohio... Ross County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 245 AM EDT. * At 201 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bainbridge to Manchester, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Waverly, Piketon, Peebles, Vanceburg, Kingston, Bainbridge, Rome, Lucasville, Pike Lake, Kincaid Springs, Cynthiana, North Folk Village, Blue Creek, Londonderry, Beaver, Rarden, Sinking Spring, Otway and Locust Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
